um, my antivirus says this has a trojan in one of the exe's - anyone else care to comment? Maybe a false positive?
3.0.100.399.exe is a Trojan. Let your antivirus remove it. DO NOT EXECUTE IT!!! Install program, copy cracked files into installation directory, run bat file and that's it.
Trojan in the archive. So much for trusting the green skull :P
as Adam_OSFP stated, all files and fix are OK and WORKING, except file "3.0.100.399.exe" which is TROJAN WIN32/DYNAMER!DTC - so just delete this 1 crap and enjoy ;-)
So can the retail app be downloaded and installed, and use the "Fix" files to patch it?

Didn't execute 3.0.100.399.exe. Still works fine.
Thanks!
strange.... I scanned all files with Kaspersky (legit updated version), including 3.0.100.399.exe. No trojan detected.... a false positive maybe? I also checked it online
